main.name: Nakul Bageja
main.bio: I'm an upcoming software engineer, currently in my final year of undergrad. I have experience in Mobile and Web Application development. I'm extensively following the growth of Blockchain Technology, which I believe is going to explode in near future. I have started freelancing to gain more experience in developing client products and upgrade my skills. My dream is to develop softwares to make people life easy.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

work.title: Associate Chat Bot Developer
work.description: I developed Chat Bot for SAP's CRM and ERP system on Microsoft Teams and Google Chat using Microsoft Bot Framework and Hangout Chat API.

work.title: Mobile Application Developer
work.description: I developed a Mobile application for Reimbursement using IONIC Framework.

projects.title: Decentralized System For Medical Records
projects.category: Decentralized System For Medical Records with ReactJS, Ethereum and NodeJs

projects.title: Microsoft Chat Bot for Food Delivery and Job recruitment
projects.category: Microsoft Chat Bot made using Microsoft's Bot FrameWork V4

testimonials.text: Nakul is knowledgeable, articulate and pleasure to work with. He had been a mentee who would put on his full efforts to the assigned task and tried to complete it in best possible way. He had been always eager to learn, play around with new tools and technologies and undoutably took care of his responsibilities very well. He is a definitely good to go person if you are looking for someone whom you can just assign something and forget about it as Nakul will definitely come back to you after it has accomplished it in best way possible.
testimonials.user: Rohit Sharma, Software Development Engineer - Chatbot & Web App (Nodejs, JAVA, SQL, Azure Cloud) @Celebal Technologies.

testimonials.text: Nakul is one of the best among all the people I have ever worked with. As I remember Nakul was a very productive person, is hardworking,broad-minded, and forward-thinking individual. He is a very good person and a great employee with very strong problem-solving skills, Nakul is an asset to any company.
testimonials.user: Prit Kumari, IT professional with 5+ yearsâ€™ experience.
